thread.title: Ivanka Trump wears a $160 coat from her own collection as she takes her daughter to the Supreme Court
thread.title_full: Ivanka Trump wears a $160 coat from her own collection as she takes her daughter to the Supreme Court

title: Ivanka Trump wears a $160 coat from her own collection as she takes her daughter to the Supreme Court
text:
People 13 Feb 2017 Ivanka Trump continues to wear pieces from her own eponymous line, despite US department stores dropping it after poor sales Previous slide Next slide 1 of 33 View All Skip Ad 
Since Ivanka Trump became the new First Daughter her polished style - and eponymous fashion line - have come to the world's attention. 
Critics of her father Donald Trump launched #GrabYourWallet, a social media campaign to encourage people to stop buying her brand of clothing and accessories - and it seems to have worked. Earlier this month, US department store Nordstrom announced they would no longer be stocking her line after poor sales . K Mart and Sears have now followed suit. 
Whilst that infuriated the President , whose team's public support of his daughter is now being investigated by the ethics committee, Ivanka seems unfazed. 
Despite the controversy, her own brand of perfume has seen sales soar and is currently Amazon's bestselling fragrance. 
Ivanka has continued to wear pieces from her own fashion line, including this 'Walker' coat which usually retails for $160 as she visited the Supreme Court with her daughter Arabella yesterday. 
Click through our gallery to see what else Ivanka has worn from her own collection - and how her style has developed over the years...
